item.description:
As I am watching the news today (Friday, 7/18) there is a lot of
Buzz about how dark the Dark Knight was.

Fox and Friends even had Adam West & Lee Merriweather on
Promoting the Campy Batman DVD release.

This must be Batman Weekend.

If any of you are going to see Batman this weekend, then let us
Know so we can create a Meet Up for it.

I can wait for the Buzz to go down to see it on August 2.

Message from 7/18 revised on 7/30.


A.
http://www.imdb.com/t...

www.imdb.com/title/tt0468569/

B.
http://en.wikipedia.o...)

thedarkknight.warnerbros.com/
item.how_to_find_us: 15 minutes before the show meet at the right of the main enterance doors.
item.name: Coffee Talk Brews about the Dark Knight on 8/2
